nodes.text: The Taffral home was the home of the Taffral family on Saleucami, which Glen Taffral and brothers Dav and Webb Taffral lived in. The floors inside were wooden, and it included a dining room. In around 4 ABY, Dav was forced to flee the home after Webb, an Imperial loyalist, turned in his Rebel Alliance affiliated brother.
The Taffral home first appeared in Aftermath, a canon 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig that was released as part of the Journey to Star Wars: The Force Awakens publishing program.
